msg: Use stream translation API to check for file modifications.

author: lundblad
msg: Fix issue #2315: assertion failure in ra_svn when using -rPREV on a path
without a committed revision (i.e. added path).
(svn_client__get_revision_number): Error out if a committed revision

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Create Serf SSL buckets so we can perform RA methods securely.
(setup_propfind): Create the encrypt bucket if we need it.
(conn_setup): Allow us to grab our shared ssl context from the decryptor.
(setup_serf_req): Create the encrypt bucket if we need it.
